title: Beam Sword
summaries: The Beam Sword is a rare Hardmode sword which occasionally fires a gold-colored Sword Beam projectile when swung. It costs no ammunition or mana, emits a small amount of light, deals the same damage as the sword, is not affected by gravity, and dissipates upon hitting an enemy or solid block. The Beam Sword has a 0.67*1/150 (0.67%) chance of being dropped by Armored Skeletons.
